About.LoveBuild: I love to build awesome apps.
About.Me: I'm an enthusiast for building all kinds of projects. I've successfully built apps using Vue, Angular, and React for the Frontend, and .Net, Spring Boot, and Node for the Backend. My curiosity and quick learning ability have allowed me to acquire a wide range of skills. My goal is to continue expanding my work experience and keep learning new technologies and methodologies. I'm always ready for the next challenge!
About.PreviousW/P: Check out my previous work / projects

Projects.Title: Apps I've worked on
Projects.Description: Below you'll find a selection of applications I've worked on. Each one highlights my contributions to software development, from design to implementation. Feel free to explore!

ProjectsItem.FlitDesc: FLIT is an ERP designed for the transportation sector, optimizing fleet management, trip planning, and ticketing through automation and real-time tracking
ProjectsItem.BranchOutDesc: Streamlines workforce tracking by scanning employee QR codes, instantly logging attendance with timestamps and key details. Filter and analyze records effortlessly
ProjectsItem.NeuroPeruDesc: Medical platform for neurosurgery, neurology, and traumatology consultations. It also offers medical equipment rentals and an information hub managed by specialists
ProjectsItem.CreditDesc: Simulate your car credit and plan your finances with my app

Skills.Title: Skills & Technologies
Skills.Description: Throughout my career, I've acquired a broad range of technical skills across various technologies. My experience spans from frontend and backend development to database management and user interface design. I'm always ready to learn and adapt to new technologies to stay up-to-date with the latest trends in software development.

Education.Title: My Education
Education.Description: Currently, I am in my fourth year of the Software Engineering degree at UPC University. Throughout my academic journey, I've had the opportunity to delve into various aspects of software development and engineering principles. At UPC, I've been involved in numerous projects ranging from web development to mobile application design. I'm excited to showcase the projects I've developed and the skills I've honed during my time at the university.

ProjectsItem.CalendarDesc: A web application where you can create events and share them in a same calendar with everyone
ProjectsItem.JournalDesc: Create, manage and attach images to notes with our Journal App
ProjectsItem.HouseKeeperDesc: A platform for travelers to find caretakers for their homes while they are away
ProjectsItem.ApiTechXPrimeDesc: A service for customers to request tech repairs and for technicians to track earnings

Contact.Title: Hire me!
Contact.Description: Looking for a passionate, quick-learning, and experienced developer? That's me! I've worked with a wide range of technologies and I'm always ready for new challenges. I can bring your ideas to life and help you achieve your goals. Let's build something amazing together!
